questions.question: What is phishing?
options: B. A cybersecurity attack that uses deceptive emails to trick people into revealing sensitive information
C. A type of computer virus
D. A secure way to communicate online

questions.question: Which of the following is a common tactic used in phishing attacks?
How can you identify a phishing email?
options: A. By checking the sender's address
B. By clicking on all links in the email
C. By downloading all attachments in the email
D. By replying to the email with personal information

questions.question: What should you do if you receive a suspected phishing email?
options: A. Click on all links in the email to verify their authenticity
B. Download all attachments in the email to inspect them
C. Forward the email to your IT or security team
D. Reply to the email with your personal information
